Package ev3dev.actuators

Class LCDStretch

  • java.lang.Object
    • ev3dev.hardware.EV3DevDevice
      • ev3dev.actuators.LCDStretch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BrickLCD, lejos.hardware.lcd.CommonLCD, lejos.hardware.lcd.GraphicsLCD
    public class LCDStretch
extends EV3DevDevice
implements BrickLCD
    Lejos LCD reimplementation using Java2D API

      • drawString

        public void drawString​(java.lang.String str,
                       int x,
                       int y)
        Description copied from interface: BrickLCD
        Prints a string on LCD. By default:
        • anchor point is TOP-LEFT
        • text color is black
        • bg color is white
        Specified by:
        drawString in interface BrickLCD
        Parameters:
        str - - string to print
        x - - horizontal position in characters
        y - - vertical position in lines

      • drawString

        public void drawString​(java.lang.String str,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       boolean inverted)
        Description copied from interface: BrickLCD
        Prints a string on LCD. By default, anchor point is TOP-LEFT
        Specified by:
        drawString in interface BrickLCD
        Parameters:
        str - - string to print
        x - - horizontal position in characters
        y - - vertical position in lines
        inverted - - if false, print black text on white bg; if true, white text on black bg
